text: Missouri State Bears and Lady Bears are athletic teams representing the Missouri State University. The programs began back in 1908. Missouri State competes under the NCAA Division I Football Championship Subdivisions. The university began a transition to the Football Bowl Subdivision on July 1, 2024. The Missouri State University also has soccer, diving, the womenâ€™s sports and swimming. title: Missouri State Bears and Lady Bears
